courses.title: Next.js Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the basics of building modern web applications with Next.js, including routing and server-side rendering.

courses.title: React.js Basics
courses.description: Learn the core concepts of React.js, including components, hooks, and state management to build dynamic UIs.

courses.title: Advanced React.js Techniques
courses.description: Take your React skills to the next level with advanced topics such as context API, testing, and performance optimization.

courses.title: Node.js for Beginners
courses.description: Get started with Node.js and learn to build server-side applications with JavaScript, including basic APIs and HTTP requests.

courses.title: Express.js Mastery
courses.description: Learn how to build RESTful APIs with Express.js, from setting up a server to handling requests and connecting to a database.

courses.title: Full-Stack Development (MERN)
courses.description: Become a full-stack developer by mastering the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js)

courses.title: React Native Basics
courses.description: Learn to build cross-platform mobile apps with React Native, covering components, navigation, and state management.

courses.title: Next.js for SEO
courses.description: Learn how to improve your Next.js application for better SEO with server-side rendering, static site generation, and more.

courses.title: Node.js API Development
courses.description: Build scalable and secure REST APIs with Node.js and Express, including authentication, validation, and error handling.

courses.title: Advanced Express.js
courses.description: Dive deeper into Express.js with advanced concepts like middleware, authentication, and error handling in production environments.

courses.title: TypeScript with React.js
courses.description: Learn how to build React applications with TypeScript, improving type safety and development efficiency.

courses.title: GraphQL with Node.js and React
courses.description: Understand how to integrate GraphQL into your applications with Node.js and React for a more efficient API and data fetching.
